paramInformation.label: Notifications to Associated Devices
paramInformation.description: What notifications should be sent to associated devices when the state of the LED bulb is changed

metadata.inclusion: Turn power to the bulb on/off/on/off/on - the bulb will flash 3 times indicating inclusion mode. If successful, the bulb will blink once more
metadata.exclusion: Turn power on/off/on/off/on/off/on (3 on, 2 off) - the bulb will blink 3 times. The bulb will blink once more when exclusion is successful
metadata.reset: Power the bulb on/off 6 times (between 0.5-2 seconds each time). The bulb will flash twice to indicate factory reset
